a1: UTC (Coordinated Universal Time) is the primary time standard by which the world regulates clocks and time. It is essentially the same as GMT (Greenwich Mean Time).
q2: Does this tool handle daylight saving time?
a2: Yes, the converter uses your browser Intl API which automatically accounts for daylight saving time transitions.
a3: We support 28+ major timezones covering all continents including Americas, Europe, Asia, Africa, Australia, and Pacific regions.
